    • Method Detail

      • validate

        org.bukkit.craftbukkit.libs.org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String> validate(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                      Context context,
                                                                                                                      @Nonnull
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Defines a specific validation step.
        Parameters:
        context - The command context
        arguments - The command arguments
        Returns:
        An ImmutablePair object whose left object indicates the success of the validation and whose right object contains a user-friendly error message that should be null if the left boolean is true
